name: Rachael's Turkey Chili Cheese Burgers
ingredients: 1/3 cup red bell pepper, minced, 1 1/2 ounces
4 ounces cheddar cheese, cut in 1/4" dice

instructions.en: Mix all ingredients well in a large bowl.
instructions.sk: V veľkej miske dobre zmiešajte všetky ingrediencie.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルに全ての材料をよく混ぜ合わせます。
混ぜ合わせた材料を4等分してパティを作ります。

instructions.en: Grill or pan fry the patties until cooked through.
instructions.sk: Grilujte alebo smažte fašírky, kým nie sú prepečené.
instructions.ja: パティをグリルまたはフライパンで中まで火が通るまで調理します。

notes: Makes 4 servings. Can be frozen. Nutritional information varies based on the amount of ground turkey used (20 oz or 32 oz).
